parameters.name: SlotsOf
parameters.type: C2Spec -> list KRole.  (* ============================================    7) Fractal Invariants (Main Theorems)    ============================================ *)  (* Parameter: Phonetic constraint - consonants require vowels    This is a fundamental phonological rule enforced by the grammar *) Parameter consonant_needs_vowel : forall (fc : FractalCell Phoneme),   well_formed_phonetic fc
parameters.documentation: SlotsOf: function from C2Spec to available slots This will be defined in SlotsTable.v

parameters.name: consonant_needs_vowel
parameters.documentation: Parameter: Phonetic constraint - consonants require vowels This is a fundamental phonological rule enforced by the grammar

parameters.name: c2_always_present
parameters.type: forall (A : Type) (fc : FractalCell A),   exists x, c2 fc = x
parameters.documentation: Parameter: C2 is always present (fractal core invariant) This structural property is guaranteed by construction

parameters.name: token_id_positive
parameters.type: forall t:Token, token_id t > 0.  Theorem encode_preserves_nonempty :    forall s:Sentence,    C3_ok s = true ->    encode_sentence s > 0
parameters.documentation: Constraint: all token IDs must be positive

parameters.name: policy_enforced
parameters.type: kernel_policy.  (* ============================================    3) Proof Certificate    ============================================ *)  (* A proof certificate records which tactics were used *) Record ProofCertificate : Type := {   theorem_name : string;   tactics_used : list AllowedTactic;   proof_steps  : nat  (* number of proof steps *) }
parameters.documentation: Parameter: The policy is enforced through external CI checking This meta-level property is verified by check_coq_tactics.py

parameters.name: passive_hides_agent
parameters.type: forall spec used_roles,   voice spec = PASSIVE ->   ~ In AGENT used_roles
parameters.documentation: Parameter: Passive voice hides explicit agent from surface roles This is a linguistic constraint enforced by the grammar

summary.description: Trusted Computing Base (TCB) for Arabic Fractal Kernel
summary.trust_model: All Parameters represent external assumptions that the kernel accepts as axioms
summary.verification_status: All theorems proven modulo these Parameters
